## Exercise 2.4

```{r}
domainValues<-10^(c(1:10))
# avoid scientific notation
options(scipen=1000)
# increase significant digits
options(digits=22)
# applying formula
rangeValues<- ( 1 + 1/domainValues)^domainValues
# force output to a single column of values
options(width=40)
rangeValues
```
